short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hnetu viðvörunarkerfi. This extension highlights divs containing peanuts or nuts in the Icelandic Maul menus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension highlights items containing peanuts or nuts in the Icelandic Maul menus.
It is to help people see when an item on the menu contains nuts so they don't accidentally order it.
